name: The Schism
description:
You shoot out of the dark passage, visages of spiders haunting your step. 

	The air sounds dark around you, yet a dim blue-white light is emanating from a great crevasse ahead. 
A strange humming rings in your ears interspersed with loud cracks, as though lightning itself is being restrained...
instruction:
A shadow shifts, and an evil laugh echos from the shadows ahead. 

	Are you prepared? Dare you approach?
 (South to exit)
